verses.verse: וַיַּגִּ֥דוּ <S%H5046><s%> Then they told לְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> Behold the Philistines נִלְחָמִ֣ים <S%H3898><s%> fight בִּקְעִילָ֔ה <S%H7084><s%> against Keilah וְהֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> and are שֹׁסִ֥ים <S%H8154><s%> and they rob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגֳּרָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1637><s%> the threshingfloors

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <S%H7592><s%> enquired דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> Therefore David בַּֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַאֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go וְהִכֵּ֔יתִי <S%H5221><s%> and smite בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these ס וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David לֵ֚ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְהִכִּ֣יתָ <S%H5221><s%> and smite בַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines וְהוֹשַׁעְתָּ֖ <S%H3467><s%> and save אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קְעִילָֽה׃ <S%H7084><s%> Keilah

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <S%H559><s%> said אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> men דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David's אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> against הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we פֹ֛ה <S%H6311><s%> here בִּֽיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> here in Judah יְרֵאִ֑ים <S%H3372><s%> are afraid וְאַף֙ <S%H637><s%> How כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if נֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go קְעִלָ֔ה <S%H7084><s%> to Keilah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against מַֽעַרְכ֖וֹת <S%H4634><s%> against the armies פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> Philistine ס

וַיּ֨וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> yet again ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Then דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> Then David לִשְׁאֹ֣ל <S%H7592><s%> enquired בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD ס וַֽיַּעֲנֵ֖הוּ <S%H6030><s%> answered יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and said ק֚וּם <S%H6965><s%> Arise רֵ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> go down קְעִילָ֔ה <S%H7084><s%> to Keilah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I נֹתֵ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> for I will deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> into thine hand

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went דָּוִד֩ <S%H1732><s%> So David [וַאִנְשֹׁו כ] (וַאֲנָשָׁ֨יו <S%H376><s%> he ק) קְעִילָ֜ה <S%H7084><s%> to Keilah וַיִּלָּ֣חֶם <S%H3898><s%> and fought בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> with the Philistines וַיִּנְהַג֙ <S%H5090><s%> and brought away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H4735><s%> their cattle וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> and smote בָּהֶ֖ם מַכָּ֣ה <S%H4347><s%> slaughter גְדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> them with a great וַיֹּ֣שַׁע <S%H3467><s%> saved דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> So David אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants קְעִילָֽה׃ <S%H7084><s%> of Keilah ס

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בִּ֠בְרֹחַ <S%H1272><s%> fled אֶבְיָתָ֧ר <S%H54><s%> And it came to pass when Abiathar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִימֶ֛לֶךְ <S%H288><s%> of Ahimelech אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> to David קְעִילָ֑ה <S%H7084><s%> to Keilah אֵפ֖וֹד <S%H646><s%> [with] an ephod יָרַ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> [that] he came down בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand

וַיֻּגַּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> And it was told לְשָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֥א <S%H935><s%> was come דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> that David קְעִילָ֑ה <S%H7084><s%> to Keilah וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul נִכַּ֨ר <S%H5234><s%> hath delivered אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> God בְּיָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> him into mine hand כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for נִסְגַּ֣ר <S%H5462><s%> for he is shut in לָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> by entering בְּעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> into a town דְּלָתַ֥יִם <S%H1817><s%> that hath gates וּבְרִֽיחַ׃ <S%H1280><s%> and bars

וַיְשַׁמַּ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> together שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> all the people לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> to war לָרֶ֣דֶת <S%H3381><s%> to go down קְעִילָ֔ה <S%H7084><s%> to Keilah לָצ֥וּר <S%H6696><s%> to besiege אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and אֲנָשָֽׁיו׃ <S%H376><s%> his men

וַיֵּ֣דַע <S%H3045><s%> knew דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> against שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> that Saul מַחֲרִ֣ישׁ <S%H2790><s%> secretly practised הָרָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> mischief וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> against him and he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶבְיָתָ֣ר <S%H54><s%> to Abiathar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest הַגִּ֖ישָׁה <S%H5066><s%> Bring hither הָאֵפֽוֹד׃ <S%H646><s%> the ephod ס

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> Then said דָּוִד֒ <S%H1732><s%> David יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שָׁמֹ֤עַ <S%H8085><s%> hath certainly שָׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> heard עַבְדְּךָ֔ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> seeketh שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> that Saul לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> to come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to קְעִילָ֑ה <S%H7084><s%> to Keilah לְשַׁחֵ֥ת <S%H7843><s%> to destroy לָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city בַּעֲבוּרִֽי׃ <S%H5668><s%> my account

הֲיַסְגִּרֻ֣נִי <S%H5462><s%> deliver me up בַעֲלֵי֩ <S%H1167><s%> Will the men קְעִילָ֨ה <S%H7084><s%> of Keilah בְיָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> able הֲיֵרֵ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> come down שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> hath שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> hath heard עַבְדֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5650><s%> as thy servant יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> ? O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> I beseech thee tell נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> pray לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant ס וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD יֵרֵֽד׃ <S%H3381><s%> He will come down

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David הֲיַסְגִּ֜רוּ <S%H5462><s%> deliver בַּעֲלֵ֧י <S%H1167><s%> Will the men קְעִילָ֛ה <S%H7084><s%> of Keilah אֹתִ֥י <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲנָשַׁ֖י <S%H376><s%> and my men בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah יַסְגִּֽירוּ׃ <S%H5462><s%> They will deliver [thee] up ס

וַיָּקָם֩ <S%H6965><s%> arose דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> Then David וַאֲנָשָׁ֜יו <S%H376><s%> and his men כְּשֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> [which were] about six מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and his men וַיֵּצְאוּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> and departed מִקְּעִלָ֔ה <S%H7084><s%> out of Keilah וַיִּֽתְהַלְּכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> and went בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whithersoever יִתְהַלָּ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> they could go וּלְשָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul הֻגַּ֗ד <S%H5046><s%> And it was told כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִמְלַ֤ט <S%H4422><s%> was escaped דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> that David מִקְּעִילָ֔ה <S%H7084><s%> from Keilah וַיֶּחְדַּ֖ל <S%H2308><s%> and he forbare לָצֵֽאת׃ <S%H3318><s%> to go forth

וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> abode דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> And David בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness בַּמְּצָד֔וֹת <S%H4679><s%> in strong holds וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and remained בָּהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> in a mountain בְּמִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness זִ֑יף <S%H2128><s%> of Ziph וַיְבַקְשֵׁ֤הוּ <S%H1245><s%> sought שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> And Saul כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> him every day וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not נְתָנ֥וֹ <S%H5414><s%> delivered אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> but God בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> him not into his hand

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> was come out שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> that Saul לְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his life וְדָוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> and David בְּמִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> [was] in the wilderness זִ֖יף <S%H2128><s%> of Ziph בַּחֹֽרְשָׁה׃ <S%H2793><s%> in a wood ס

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> arose יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <S%H3083><s%> And Jonathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul's וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> to David חֹ֑רְשָׁה <S%H2793><s%> into the wood וַיְחַזֵּ֥ק <S%H2388><s%> and strengthened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand בֵּאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> in God

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> unto him Fear כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> will not תִֽמְצָאֲךָ֙ <S%H4672><s%> shall not find יַ֚ד <S%H3027><s%> not for the hand שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> my father וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> and you תִּמְלֹ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> thee and thou shalt be king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> over Israel וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I אֶֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לְּךָ֣ לְמִשְׁנֶ֑ה <S%H4932><s%> and I shall be next וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also שָׁא֥וּל <S%H7586><s%> unto thee and that also Saul אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> my father יֹדֵ֥עַ <S%H3045><s%> knoweth כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> of them

וַיִּכְרְת֧וּ <S%H3772><s%> made שְׁנֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H8147><s%> And they two בְּרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> abode דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> and David בַּחֹ֔רְשָׁה <S%H2793><s%> in the wood וִיהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> and Jonathan הָלַ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went לְבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> to his house ס

וַיַּעֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> Then came up זִפִים֙ <S%H2130><s%> the Ziphites אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> to Saul הַגִּבְעָ֖תָה <S%H1390><s%> to Gibeah לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not דָ֠וִד <S%H1732><s%> Doth not David מִסְתַּתֵּ֨ר <S%H5641><s%> hide עִמָּ֤נוּ <S%H5973><s%> in בַמְּצָדוֹת֙ <S%H4679><s%> himself with us in strong holds בַּחֹ֔רְשָׁה <S%H2793><s%> in the wood בְּגִבְעַת֙ <S%H1389><s%> in the hill הַֽחֲכִילָ֔ה <S%H2444><s%> of Hachilah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which מִימִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> which [is] on the south הַיְשִׁימֽוֹן׃ <S%H3452><s%> desert

וְ֠עַתָּה <S%H6258><s%> Now לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all אַוַּ֨ת <S%H185><s%> according to all the desire נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <S%H5315><s%> of thy soul הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Now therefore O king לָרֶ֖דֶת <S%H3381><s%> come down רֵ֑ד <S%H3381><s%> to come down וְלָ֥נוּ הַסְגִּיר֖וֹ <S%H5462><s%> and our part [shall be] to deliver בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> hand הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> him into the king's

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul בְּרוּכִ֥ים <S%H1288><s%> Blessed אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [be] ye of the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for חֲמַלְתֶּ֖ם <S%H2550><s%> for ye have compassion עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

לְכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> Go נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> now הָכִ֣ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> I pray you prepare ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more וּדְע֤וּ <S%H3045><s%> yet and know וּרְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> and see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְקוֹמוֹ֙ <S%H4725><s%> his place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after תִּֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become רַגְל֔וֹ <S%H7272><s%> where his haunt מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> is who רָאָ֖הוּ <S%H7200><s%> is [and] who hath seen שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> him there for it is told אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about עָר֥וֹם <S%H6191><s%> me [that] he dealeth very יַעְרִ֖ם <S%H6196><s%> chestnut tree הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וּרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> See וּדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> therefore and take knowledge מִכֹּ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> all הַמַּֽחֲבֹאִים֙ <S%H4224><s%> of all the lurking places אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he יִתְחַבֵּ֣א <S%H2244><s%> where he hideth שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> in it וְשַׁבְתֶּ֤ם <S%H7725><s%> himself and come ye again אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to me נָכ֔וֹן <S%H3559><s%> to me with the certainty וְהָלַכְתִּ֖י <S%H1980><s%> and I will go אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> for וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become אִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if יֶשְׁנ֣וֹ <S%H3426><s%> with you and it shall come to pass if he be בָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land וְחִפַּשְׂתִּ֣י <S%H2664><s%> that I will search אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all אַלְפֵ֥י <S%H505><s%> him out throughout all the thousands יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul מִצַּ֤ד <S%H6654><s%> on this side הָהָר֙ <S%H2022><s%> of the mountain מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> one וְדָוִ֧ד <S%H1732><s%> and David וַאֲנָשָׁ֛יו <S%H376><s%> and his men מִצַּ֥ד <S%H6654><s%> on that side הָהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> of the mountain מִזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> the other וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> and David נֶחְפָּ֤ז <S%H2648><s%> made haste לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> to get מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> for fear שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וְשָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> for Saul וַאֲנָשָׁ֗יו <S%H376><s%> and his men עֹֽטְרִ֛ים <S%H5849><s%> round about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> David וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and אֲנָשָׁ֖יו <S%H376><s%> his men לְתָפְשָֽׂם׃ <S%H8610><s%> to take
